original_text: There are some people who are very cruel. Their teeth are like swords and sharp knives. They want to eat up all the poor and helpless people, so that they disappear from the earth. There are some people who are very cruel. Their teeth are like swords and sharp knives. They want to eat up all the poor and helpless people, so that they disappear from the earth. There are some people who are very cruel. Their teeth are like swords and sharp knives. They want to eat up all the poor and helpless people, so that they disappear from the earth.
korean_text: 앞니는 장검 같고 어금니는 군도 같아서 가난한 자를 땅에서 삼키며 궁핍한 자를 사람 중에서 삼키는 무리가 있느니라

sentences.original_text: There are some people who are very cruel.
Their teeth are like swords and sharp knives.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 이는 칼과 날카로운 칼과 같습니다.

sentences.original_text: They want to eat up all the poor and helpless people,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모든 가난하고 무력한 사람들을 잡아먹으려 합니다.

sentences.original_text: so that they disappear from the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들이 땅에서 사라지도록 하려는 것입니다.
